definitions.definition: In the middle of a ship , either longitudinally or laterally .
Usually in the line of the keel , but sometimes halfway between bow and stern ; often contracted to “midships.” (FM 55-501).
On the flank, at a vulnerable place.

main_definition: ( nautical ) In the middle of a ship , either longitudinally or laterally .
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) Usually in the line of the keel , but sometimes halfway between bow and stern ; often contracted to “midships.” (FM 55-501).
( figuratively ) On the flank, at a vulnerable place.
